title: Outlook: Developers can now build Microsoft Teams apps with Outlook add-ins as extension element
description: Developers can now build and publish Teams apps with Outlook add-ins for use by their customers. Users can acquire these Teams apps with Outlook add-in for themselves via Outlook on the web, new Outlook for Windows, and classic Outlook for Windows clients. Admins can deploy to users from Integrated Apps in Microsoft 365 Admin Center. #newoutlookforwindows
